extracted_playbook.title: Review Configuration Changes
extracted_playbook.description: System owners and administrators should review any configuration change prior to implementation to avoid unwanted impacts.

extracted_playbook.title: Include Warning Banners for External Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Include warning banners for all emails external to the organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Up-to-Date Antivirus Signatures and Engines
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure antivirus signatures and engines are up-to-date to protect against malicious code.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Systems Have Latest Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure systems have the latest security updates to protect against vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable File and Printer Sharing Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable file and printer sharing services. If these services are required, use strong passwords or Active Directory authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict User Permissions
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict users' permissions to install and run unwanted software applications. Do not add users to the local administrators’ group unless required.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Strong Password Policy
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce a strong password policy to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution with Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Exercise caution when opening email attachments, even if the attachment is expected and the sender appears to be known.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Personal Firewall on Workstations
extracted_playbook.description: Enable a personal firewall on agency workstations that is configured to deny unsolicited connection requests.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unnecessary Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unnecessary services on agency workstations and servers.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan and Remove Suspicious Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Scan for and remove suspicious email attachments; ensure the scanned attachment is its 'true file type' (i.e., the extension matches the file header).

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Users' Web Browsing Habits
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor users' web browsing habits; restrict access to sites with unfavorable content.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution with Removable Media
extracted_playbook.description: Exercise caution when using removable media (e.g., USB thumb drives, external drives, CDs).

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Downloaded Software
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all software downloaded from the internet prior to executing.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Situational Awareness of Latest Threats
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain situational awareness of the latest threats and implement appropriate Access Control Lists (ACLs).

extracted_playbook.title: Sign Up for CISA Alerts
extracted_playbook.description: Sign up to receive CISA’s alerts on security topics and threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Sign Up for CISA Vulnerability Scanning Services
extracted_playbook.description: Sign up for CISA’s free vulnerability scanning and testing services to help secure internet-facing systems from weak configuration and known vulnerabilities. Email vulnerability@cisa.dhs.gov to sign up.

extracted_playbook.title: Visit CISA Cyber Resource Hub
extracted_playbook.description: Visit https://www.cisa.gov/cyber-resource-hub for more information about vulnerability scanning and other CISA cybersecurity assessment services.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Reviewed Configuration Changes
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the reviewed configuration changes to strengthen security posture.

cve_id: CISA Best Practices for Security Posture
